name: Gold Fields Limited
description: Gold Fields Limited is a globally recognized gold mining company with a rich history and commitment to sustainable mining practices. Founded in 1887, Gold Fields has evolved into one of the largest gold producers in the world, operating several mines across Ghana, Australia, Peru, and South Africa. The company's operations are characterized by a focus on responsible mining, which encompasses environmental stewardship, social responsibility, and economic value creation for its stakeholders. Gold Fields is dedicated to improving the lives of the communities in which it operates and adheres to high ethical standards and transparency in its operations. The company is also investing in innovation and technology to enhance its mining processes and increase operational efficiency. With an emphasis on sustainability, Gold Fields aims to minimize its environmental impact while maximizing resource recovery and providing safe working conditions for its employees. The company’s vision is to be the preferred gold mining company, delivering superior returns to its shareholders while being a leader in sustainable mining.

faq.answer: Gold Fields is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.

faq.question: What are the main products of Gold Fields?
faq.answer: Gold Fields primarily produces gold in the form of bars and nuggets.
